thread.title: 7 Ties to Instantly Make Your Work Outfit Less Boring - WSJ.com

author: Jody Rogac For Wsj. Magazine
title: 7 Ties to Instantly Make Your Work Outfit Less Boring - WSJ.com
text: 7 Ties to Instantly Make Your Work Outfit Less Boring Neckwear diversifies its portfolio this season, loosening up in vivid colors and graphic patterns. Jody Rogac for WSJ. Magazine; Fashion Editor Isaiah Freeman-Schub Scroll KNOTTY AND NICE Kenzo tie, $180, and pants, $395, kenzo​.com, Dior Homme shirt, price upon request, Dior Homme stores, Dunhill jacket, $750, dunhill​.com. Jody Rogac for WSJ. Magazine; Fashion Editor Isaiah Freeman-Schub P. Johnson tie, $135, pjt​.com, Michael Kors shirt, $128, michaelkors​.com, Stella McCartney coat, price upon request, similar styles available at Stella McCartney, 112 Greene Street, New York. Jody Rogac for WSJ. Magazine; Fashion Editor Isaiah Freeman-Schub Marni tie, $210, and shirt, $570, Marni boutiques, MHL by Margaret Howell pants, $425, and belt, $145, margarethowell.co.uk. Jody Rogac for WSJ. Magazine; Fashion Editor Isaiah Freeman-Schub Giorgio Armani tie, $225, Giorgio Armani boutiques nationwide, Wooyoungmi (all in one) sweater and shirt, $695, mrporter​.com. FANCY FREE Boglioli tie, $150, Boglioli, 10 Bond Street, New York, Gucci jacket, $4,980, select Gucci stores nationwide, Brunello Cucinelli shirt, $545, Brunello Cucinelli, 136 Greene Street, New York. Jody Rogac for WSJ. Magazine; Fashion Editor Isaiah Freeman-Schub Bottega Veneta tie, $190, 800-845-6790, Dries Van Noten shirt, $490, totokaelo​.com, Boss pants, $295, hugoboss​.com. Jody Rogac for WSJ. Magazine; Fashion Editor Isaiah Freeman-Schub MODERN TWIST Color blocking piques interest. Margaret Howell tie, $155, margarethowell.co.uk, Prada cardigan, $1,310, select Prada boutiques, Salvatore Ferragamo shirt, price upon request, Salvatore Ferragamo boutiques nationwide. Model, Damien Medina at Red Model Management; grooming, Christyna Kay. Jody Rogac for WSJ. Magazine; Fashion Editor Isaiah Freeman-Schub Advertisement
